welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Yulu, China! Explore the charm of this historic city, known for its beautiful ancient architecture, delicious cuisine, and vibrant culture. We hope you enjoy your time here and make unforgettable memories."

wifi.note: Passengers can connect to the airport's free WiFi network by selecting 'Shantou Airport WiFi' and following the prompts.
